overview_of_class:
Introduction to fundamentals of the French business world. Focused on seeking employment in a French-speaking environment, this course is designed to familiarize students with the business culture in France and in the Francophone world. The essential components of the course include acquiring knowledge of the economic sector, business structures and practices, business communication skills, as well as cultural competency.

In a student-centered classroom, students will practice their writing and speaking skills by way of reality-based and task-specific communicative activities. They will, for example, write a CV and a cover letter, conduct a job interview, respond to business clients, and present a company. Upon completion of the course, students will have created a personalized portfolio of a French company that can be used as a model when entering the job market.
